content.rendered:
Directed by Arjunn Dutta

Written by Arjunn Dutta. Ashirbad Maitra

Star Swastika Mukherjee. Barkha Bisht. Soham Chakraborty. Trina Saha. Farabi Md Refat(Brother). Kheya Chattopadhyay

Language Bengali

Producers Kan Singh Sodha

Production KSS Productions & Entertainment
